import{useContext}from'react';import{CartContext}from'../../context/cart-context.context';import Button from'../cutombutton/custombutton.component';import'./product-card.styles.scss';//product : id,name,imgaeUrl,price
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Shopitem=function Shopitem(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var name=product.name,imageUrl=product.imageUrl,price=product.price;var _useContext=useContext(CartContext),addItemToCart=_useContext.addItemToCart;var addProducttoCart=function addProducttoCart(){addItemToCart(product);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:"clothing type ".concat(name)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"price",children:price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttontype:"inverted",onClick:addProducttoCart,children:"ADD TO CART"})]});};export default Shopitem;
